CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(expirationDay__c ))), IF( CASE(expirationDay__c, "Dimanche", 0, "Lundi", 1, "Mardi", 2, "Mercredi", 3, "Jeudi", 4, "Vendredi", 5, "Samedi", 6, 0) >= MOD( (TODAY() + expirationDelay__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7),
TODAY() + expirationDelay__c + (CASE(expirationDay__c, "Dimanche", 0, "Lundi", 1, "Mardi", 2, "Mercredi", 3, "Jeudi", 4, "Vendredi", 5, "Samedi", 6, 0) - MOD( (TODAY() + expirationDelay__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7)),
TODAY() + expirationDelay__c + (7 + CASE(expirationDay__c, "Dimanche", 0, "Lundi", 1, "Mardi", 2, "Mercredi", 3, "Jeudi", 4, "Vendredi", 5, "Samedi", 6, 0) - MOD( (TODAY() + expirationDelay__c) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7)) ), TODAY() + expirationDelay__c )
CustomField.label: Date d'expiration (Ã instant T)
